attributes.review: This stupid app keeps crashing and the moment I downloaded it, I began to get numerous emails and phone calls from people who are very obviously trying to scam me. They're saying things like "Trump 2020", advertising his campaign, and asking me for money. I'm not sure what's going on but these incessant calls and emails won't stop. It's at a point where I can't even use my phone. Please just make it stop. I'm definitely not voting for Donald Trump because of this.
attributes.title: Getting bombarded with scam calls and won't let me open the thing.

I repeat: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
